metadata.name: Digital Art Book
metadata.description: Jordi Molla’s book is itself a remarkable work of art. It is a small edition number of very high-quality books that this artist created for his inner circle of collectors and fellow artists. It gives us an intimate glimpse into Jordi’s home, atelier, and his working process, a raw, poignant day-by-day diary that brings the viewers a personal and unfiltered behind-the-scenes view.
